class.name: JointLimitationCone3D
class.brief_description: A cone shape limitation that interacts with [ChainIK3D].
class.description: A cone shape limitation that interacts with [ChainIK3D].

members.member: The radius range of the hole made by the cone. [code]0[/code] degrees makes a sphere without hole, [code]180[/code] degrees makes a hemisphere, and [code]360[/code] degrees become empty (no limitation).
